events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria for follow-up regarding the refund request.
Hello, I’m Maria and I will be assisting you today with your refund request. I’m here to help resolve this matter quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo of the wrong product that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for acting quickly on this. I appreciate the fast response and look forward to the refund being completed soon.
We have processed the refund on our end. Please let us know if you have any further questions or need additional assistance.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
The refund has appeared in my account today. Thank you very much for your help and quick resolution to this issue.
We are glad to hear your refund was successful. Closing this case now, please contact us anytime for further support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience with our support team.
